name: An Apple a Day
description:
How to play?
  • Keyboard - WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Mouse - Click to toss apple. The further you click, the further it goes.
  • Your own apples can ricochet back and hurt you!
  • Ran out of apples? grab a fresh batch off the apple tree
  • Try to hit knocked back apples with apples to explode and get more score (and sometimes an extra life)!
  • M to mute. P to pause.
Why make this game?

Ludum Dare is a weekend game jam. This 32nd jam's theme was "unconventional weapon". 'An Apple a day' is a mini game developed in 48 hours for Ludum Dare. We hope you enjoy it as much as we had fun making it!
